      • getWifiBSSID

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String getWifiBSSID(@NonNull
                                                      android.content.Context parentContext)
        Return the BSSID (unique identifier of the wifi router) of the actual router use by the wifi connection
        Parameters:
        parentContext - needed to access the wifi service
        Returns:
        the string of the BSSID or null if there is no connection

      • getPositionFromWifi

public static com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng getPositionFromWifi(@NonNull
                                                                                     android.content.Context parentContext)
        Getting the position of the phone from the Wifi router where it's connected
        Parameters:
        parentContext - the parent context, needed for accessing the wifi status
        Returns:
        the position of the router as a LatLng, null if the position cannot be found
